description: This file is a React component setup for a Remix-run web application. It defines the main layout, includes external CSS and font links, and renders outlet components for nested routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Function returning an array of link objects for including external fonts and stylesheets in the HTML head.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that defines the HTML structure and includes head meta tags, links, and body elements.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
